name: MUVA Virtual Museum of Art
summary: The MUVA Virtual Art Museum offers you a revolutionary virtual reality experience that is not only educational, but also social. Explore 3D exhibitions in a unique way and share the moment with up to 3 friends, allowing a group of up to 4 people to visit the museum at the same time. Together you can discover classic works of art, historical pieces and cultural objects, interacting and commenting on every detail as if you were in a real museum. This social component turns the experience into something...
